entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add Unix-specific APIs to register for IO ready notifications on the thread pool #61273
    7.0.0
  • [Bug] Publishing maui rc2 app to App Store not working -- The app references non-public symbols in MyContactNetwork.MobileMaui: _proc_pidinfo #61265
  • Add direct support for structs when deserializing with System.Text.Json.Serialization #61264
  • Consider sharing diagnostics issued by JSON source generator with reflection-based serializer #61262
    7.0.0
  • Expose TCP Keep-alive on SocketsHttpHandler #61261
  • [API Proposal]: RetryOnConnectionFailure #61257
  • HttpConnection leaks UnobservedTaskExceptions #61256
  • OnAfterRenderAsync code not executed #61255
  • [MonoVM] crash when call internal call function duration `mono_runtime_delegate_invoke` #61253
  • Create Codespaces Prebuild workflow fails on forks of this repository #61250
    7.0.0
  • Question: when would System.IO.FileNotFoundException get thrown? #61248
  • Avoiding PathTooLongException #61247
  • Blazor WebAssembly: Assertion at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/metadata/class-setup-vtable.c:1747 #61244
  • Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator does not run with the .NET 5 SDK #61243
  • Add RequiresDynamicCodeAttribute #61239
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.RevocationTests.DynamicRevocationTests.RevokeEndEntityWithInvalidRevocationName(pkiOptions: IssuerRevocationViaOcsp | AllEndEntityRevocation | RootAuthorityHasDesignatedOcspResponder) #61238
  • Test failure Interop/PInvoke/Generics/GenericsTest/GenericsTest.sh #61237

Closed

  • Memory allocation in .NET fails at 70% of the container limit when running in Kubernetes #61076
  • Visual studio 2019 F# break points ignored #61270
    6.0.0
  • Unexpected TimeSeriesLimitReached after HistogramLimitReached #60752
    7.0.0
  • Can't get project to build with .NETCoreApp, Version=v5.0 #61268
  • AssemblyLoadContext crash when collectible assembly use XmlSerializer #1388
    6.0.0
  • Don't generate guarded devirtualization for abstract classes #61190
    7.0.0
  • SemaphoreSlim.WaitAsync() begin fire TimeoutException on TaskScheduler.UnobservedTaskException in net6.0? #60856
  • wasm InvokeJS return value is broken #61192
  • use System.Drawing.Common.Bitmap.GetPixel got RGB data but the result is different from PS #61195
  • IAsyncEnumerable<T>.DisposeAsync() can't be used manually (used outside await foreach) #61236
  • Add optimization to avoid copying a struct if passed by reference and there are no writes to and no reads after passed to a callee. #4524
    Future
  • Load assemblies with nuget package dependencies #18527
    Future
  • Support GetFileInfo for directories #36575
    Future
  • Optimize number processing and validation while reading JSON token #27837
    Future
  • Evaluate feasibility of storing the JsonReaderState as a field within Utf8JsonReader #27840
    Future
  • Investigate potential optimizations for consuming escaped strings within Utf8JsonReader #27848
    Future
  • Repeatedly calling Utf8JsonReader.Read() after a JsonReaderException has been thrown should continue to fail deterministically. #27851
    Future
  • Refactor duplicate code between single and multi-segment for Utf8JsonReader (where possible) #27950
    Future
  • Expose the current context / scope as a property from the Utf8JsonReader. #1557
    Future
  • Investigate Utf8JsonWriter performance improvement by using AggressiveInlining #28408
    Future
  • Should Utf8JsonReader expose whether a JSON string needs to be unescaped or not? #28421
    Future
  • Investigate perf optimizations of unescape logic of Utf8JsonReader TextEquals #28977
    Future
  • Investigate writing large string values in 4 KB chunks within Utf8JsonWriter instead all at once #29293
    Future
  • Refactor Utf8JsonWriter code to remove code duplication #29305
    Future
  • Utf8JsonReader should provide a simple way to obtain the SequencePosition or index range corresponding to the current ValueSpan #1558
    Future
  • Refactor System.Text.Json tests to remove redundancy #29482
    Future
  • Serialization/deserialization with camel case option not working for enum type #29577
    Future
  • Should JsonSerializer.ToString output be minimally escaped JSON by default? #1564
    Future
  • System.Text.Json.Serialization namespace discrepancies #29834
    Future
  • Need to handle leap seconds in JSON DateTime parser #30135
    Future
  • Support of comments in jsondocument #30316
    Future
  • Globally ignore null values for all properties and subclasses (without JsonSerializerOptions) #30359
    Future
  • Fix implicit cast operator for JsonNumber #30523
    Future
  • Add aggressive method inlining attribute to equals on JsonNumber, JsonString and JsonBoolean #30545
    Future
  • Consider removing hard-coded limits for token sizes while writing JSON using Utf8JsonWriter #30755
    Future
  • Add performance tests for JsonNode and related types #30865
    7.0.0
  • Improve test coverage for JsonElement (when backed by JsonNode) for edge cases around enumeration #30866
    Future
  • Why is System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer not using the TypeDescriptor API to get attributes? #31064
    Future
  • System.Text.Json: JsonExtensionData should use configured PropertyNamingPolicy #31167
    Future
  • HttpClient defaults to NTLM instead of Kerberos -- .NET Core 3.0 / 3.1 Preview #31239
    Future
  • System.Text.Json Utf8JsonReader reading an empty buffer causes exception #31296
    Future
  • Decouble serializer from Utf8JsonReader #31456
    Future
  • System.Text.Json netstandard2.1 #31462
    Future
  • Investigate perf improvements for the built-in JsonNamingPolicy (SnakeCase) for DictionaryKeyPolicy #31486
    Future
  • System.Text.Json read json record by record #1526
    Future
  • Property names should escape leading "$"s when using ReferenceHandling.Preserve #1780
    Future
  • Should serialize avoid emitting metadata on types that are unsupported on deserialize? #1881
    Future
  • Add test coverage for custom struct that implements IList<T> using ReferenceHandling.Preserve #1903
    Future
  • Consider using the converters and JsonClassInfo from s_defaultOptions by cloning #32357
    Future
  • [System.Text.Json] Utf8JsonReader/Writer should support Char #32536
    Future
  • Dotnet build is stuck #33571
    Future
  • Running dotnet in Linux chroot with FreeBSD host fails #33051
    7.0.0
  • Feature request: Getting the WatcherChangeTypes from IFileProvider.Watch #36038
    Future
  • Prefer slim synchronization primitives #33803
    Future
  • [Extensions test failure]: M.E.C.UserSecrets.MsBuildTargetTest.GeneratesAssemblyAttributeFile #33989
    Future
  • Add an abstract base class to the Utf8JsonWriter, please! #34277
    Future
  • I want to use JsonIgnore only when deserializing with System.Text.Json #34404
    Future
  • Should JsonSerializerOptions have bounds in its cache size? #35084
    Future
  • System.Text.Json changes the data datatype from double to int on serialization #35195
    Future
  • Segmentation fault on Ubuntu while running corerun #35933
    Future
  • Add a property on runtime in json using System.Text.Json #37252
    Future
  • [may be a bug] serilize Task object will let cpu 100% #38111
    Future
  • Skipping Json NumberHandlingTests.DictionariesRoundTrip test for mono interpreter #39674
    Future
  • System.AccessViolationException thrown in System.Threading.ExecutionContext #40640
    Future
  • dotnet-sdk snap builds executables dependent on snaps #42907
    Future
  • System.Text.Json.Tests hang on a Checked CoreCLR #45464
    Future
  • .NET 5 application on Linux fails to create CoreCLR, 0x80004005 #46462
    7.0.0
  • [making hidden services for android and ios]: [Service for android , ios,linux,tizen and mac] #49060
    Future
  • System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext times out the connection #49367
    Future
  • LinuxNetworkInterface.GetLinuxNetworkInterfaces - An invalid IP address was specified. #49515
    Future
  • GCLatencyMode.SustainedLowLatency It doesn't work. #50847
    Future
  • provide builtin placeholder feature for configuration component #53272
    Future
  • The RuntimeIdentifier platform 'browser-wasm' and the PlatformTarget 'x64' must be compatible #53379
    7.0.0
  • NET 5 GC and Reflection performance regression #53800
    Future
  • LdapConnection BeginSendRequest does not provide information requested through the DirectoryControl #54464
    7.0.0
  • SDK 3.1 does not run on Linux ARM64 CentOS 7 #55686
    Future
  • ReaderWriterLock.IsLockHeld randomly fails in .NET 5 #56497
    Future
  • HttpClient throws No such host is known error when requesting any Url #57191
    Future
  • ParameterInfo.RawDefaultValue throws when default value is string.empty #57238
    Future
  • Reflection not working in existing project #57373
    7.0.0
  • Segmentation fault .NET core 5.0 #59232
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1457248 #61274
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • use `GenTreeFlags` oftener for better debugging. #61272
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Only run source-index on main branch. #61271
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update area-owners.md #61269
    area-Meta
  • Don't create a COM weak reference if the object is an aggregated COMWrappers RCW. #61267
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] 1388 xml serializer assembly load context awareness #61266
    Servicing-consider, area-Serialization, 6.0.x
  • Ensure ReadAheadTask exceptions are always observed #61263
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Pin Platform Manifest file to 6.0.0 Version of the file during servicing #61260
    area-Setup
  • Updating src/tests/Interop/PInvoke/Generics/GenericsNative.Vector* to annotate individual methods as requiring AVX #61259
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • ensure the AcceptSocket is cleared when AcceptAsync completes #61258
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 7.0.0
  • SPMI: Use diffed bytes for jit-analyze and print more info #61254
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix evaluation of a static class attribute #61252
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Set some missing `GTF_GLOB_REF` and improve its checking. #61245
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add additional steps in gcc validation leg #61241
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix for #60532 #61240
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Explicitly mark tests with CLRTestKind=SharedLibrary #61235
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Type key hash tweaks. #61234
    area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • Simplify minterm generation in Regex NonBacktracking engine #61232
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [wasm] Add test for blazor/sdk fix for lazy loaded assemblies #60673
    arch-wasm
  • fix unexpected TimeSeriesLimitReached after HistogramLimitReached(#60752) #61199
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • 1388 xml serializer assembly load context awareness #58932
    area-Serialization, 6.0.0
  • Fix build options for native test lib to not enable avx-512 #61229
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: don't bother with GDV for an abstract class #61191
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix UnobservedTaskException from SemaphoreSlim.WaitAsync #60890
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Revert back to eval in wasm InvokeJS with modularization support . #61212
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Fix comment typo #61246
  • JIT: Fold "shift-by-zero" in lower #61222
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix the WASM Iterator test #61242
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Update branding to 6.0.1 #61176
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • [wasm] Forward port changes from `release/6.0` in #60495 #60699
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [SUPER DRAFT] New API for invoking JS functions from C# #60765
    arch-wasm
  • Convert to OleDb assembly and last Cryptography DllImport to GeneratedDllImport #61184
    area-System.Data.OleDB, 7.0.0
  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • Use the Xunit assert library instead of CoreCLRTestLibrary for most asserts #61226
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Make WeakReferenceCollection thread safe #61054
    area-System.Composition, community-contribution
  • Fix time-of-use vs. time-of-check "bugs" #60860
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add mono_class_get_special_jit_flags and MONO_SPECIAL_JIT_DEFER_CLASS_INIT_TO_CTOR #60987
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add Enumerable.Concat & Enumerable.Flatten methods #61230
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [release/5.0] accept empty realm for digest auth (#56369) #61203
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 5.0.13
  • SrcGen fast-path serialization for nullable structs (#59719) #60366
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime Should not open a new stream to obtain a SafeFileHandle #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Fix FileSystemAclExtensions.Create when passing a null FileSecurity #59389
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Use RunContinuationsAsynchronously for block completion tasks #61140
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Enable stress log on Linux #61123
    area-GC-coreclr
  • S.IO.StringReader: Use ReadOnlySpan.IndexOfAny in ReadLine() for performance #60463
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Convert concatenation string to interpolation for System.Private.Xml #60057
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Add console version of browser-bench sample #60733
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix BigInteger.Parse returns bogus value for exponents above 1000 #55397
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Fix mono_get_generic_context_from_stack_frame when it's from a dim. #60770
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • XARCH: Remove redudant tests for GT_LT/GT_GE relops. #61152
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Create superpmi-asmdiffs pipeline #61194
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix LastWriteTime and LastAccessTime of a symlink on Windows and Unix #52639
    area-System.IO, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add proposed plan for the COM source generator #60143
    Design Discussion, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Fixing update issue with multivalued properties #34267 #56696
    area-System.DirectoryServices, blocked, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Updating and fixing unit tests for DirectoryServices.AccountManagement #56670
    area-System.DirectoryServices, blocked, community-contribution, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT] cannot preempt symbol: Program__Module__cctor #1704

Closed

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Identity FunctionPointerType in clrjit? #1703

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Upgrade emscripten and workaround cache lock problem #1702

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add support for *struct args #1698
  • Merge from dotnet/runtime #1701

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main validation-sdk-.NET Core SDK 3.1.1xx, sdk, .NET Core SDK 3.1.1xx #sdk-117297-.NETCoreSDK3.1.1xx #22493
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main validation-sdk-.NET Core SDK 3.1.4xx, sdk, .NET Core SDK 3.1.4xx #sdk-117294-.NETCoreSDK3.1.4xx #22492
  • Extra period on error message #22490
  • 'dotnet new' doesn't support net7.0 TFM #22488

Closed

  • BUG: FileVersion, ProductVerison is missing for Wrapper-Exe in .net 6 RC2 #22396
  • Implement an option for restore/build/publish commands that disable build servers. #10288
    7.0.1xx
  • `dotnet tool install --interactive` times out with .NET 6 preview SDK #18615
    6.0.2xx
  • PublishSingleFile=true does not result in a true single-file publish #14489

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add disable build server CLI option #22472
    Area-CLI
  • Remove OpCodes from event source to make events appear correctly #22458
    Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Blazor AOT Publish Tests #22477
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-AspNetCore
  • Update build.yml #22361
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #22460
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure references added using "Reference" are correctly copied in BlazorWASM projects #22470
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [Port to 6.0.2xx] Update System.CommandLine version #22351
    Area-CLI
  • Switch to 1ES servicing pools on 5.0.4xx #20865
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-05
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Adding a proposal for the self-constraint #5387

Merged

  • Explicitly specify the order of evaluation for implicit Index/Range support #5380

Updated

  • Add proposal for `params Span<T>` #5382

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve parser error recovery for statements used with expression bodied members #57614
  • Remove extraneous branch for empty strings in interpolated string handler CFG #57611
    Backlog
  • Run integration tests against unreleased builds of VS #57609
  • Support generating non-source files #57608
  • Add speedometer tests for Roslyn features #57607
  • Feedback for new global usings feature #57599
  • 'CS1591' should not suggest Design.cs file. #57595
  • How to fully verify the static tool library #57594

Closed

  • UseExpressionBodyCodeFixProvider crashes in top level statements #57570
    17.1
  • Background for editor config editors tabs are the wrong color on light theme #57255
    17.1
  • API for IFunctionPointerInvocationOperation #57195
    17.1
  • Major duplication of loc strings #52343
    17.0.P3
  • [SourceLink] Ensure source file found on disk matches compiled DLL #57351
    17.1
  • ChangeToNoGeneratedDocumentsUpdatesListCorrectly is flaky #56826
  • GetSymbolInfo for InvocationExpressionSyntax fails with OverloadResolutionFailure #57590
  • Code fix for CS1591 to inherit documentation #56620
    Backlog
  • Localize user-facing warning annotation #57296
    17.1
  • Smart line break doesn't respect indent_style #57323
    17.1.P2
  • Inconsistent order of evaluation between indexing with System.Index and System.Range #57349
    17.1
  • Function pointer invocation has "None" IOperation #48082
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Use MSBuildLocator for tests #57613
    Area-Infrastructure
  • AbstractFlowPass - VisitArrayCreation should use the regular way for visiting `initializer`. #57612
    Area-Compilers
  • Ensure we select a 'VB WithEvents' member in the navbar list when the user enters that member in the editor. #57606
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57605
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57604
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57603
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #57602
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update VS editor package version #57601
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add truly synchronous indentation service interface for F# #57600
    Area-IDE
  • Add new parser/lexer to the StackTraceAnalyzer #57598
    Area-IDE
  • Switch liveshare to use LSP pull diagnostics and cleanup server name usages #57596
    Area-IDE, LSP, UX Review Not Required

Merged

  • Don't crash Use ExpressionBody on local functions in top level statements #57571
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Benchmark for Inheritance Margin #57445
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57597
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Validate the checksum of source on disk #57541
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix flaky issue in the SourceGeneratorItemTests #57593
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Adjust the order of evaluation for implicit Index/Range support to follow the recent LDM decision. #57535
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Range, Next
  • Clean up VsCodeWindowManager #57582
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #57563
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.1 #57561
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • StackFrame Parser/Lexer as EmbeddedLanguage #56957
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Codefix for CS1591: Add ///<inheritdoc/> #57004
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Fix for "Function pointer invocation has "None" IOperation" #57191
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Have navto only search generated-documents after doing the search of regular documents. #57538
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Use DocumentOptionSet in AutomaticLineEnderCommandHandler #57579
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update the progress API shape to make it easier to mark a set of work as complete. #57547
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Track AbstractFlowPass.PendingBranches by label #57520
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57566
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • When we're loading dependencies, don't require exact versions #56432
    Area-Analyzers
  • reduce number of test legs we have to match a pairwise test approach #57586
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Interpolated string handlers in the CFG #57483
    Area-Compilers
  • Make it possible to analyze the dataflow of `ConstructorInitializerSyntax ` #57576
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Target executable projects and remote workspaces to net6.0 #57567
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable dumps for hung tests #57549
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Minor refactoring in SettingsUpdateHelper #55123
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix spacing when generating editorconfig options from UI #54601
    Area-IDE, Community
  • proposed document pull diagnostics implementation #57518
    Area-IDE
  • Respond to cancellation when a generator is running, so we can still report time. #57122
    Area-Compilers
  • Format list patterns #57568
    Area-IDE
  • Address some PROTOTYPE markers #57318
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • [LSP]Re-enable information level logging in loghub now that VS supports de… #57588
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Switch to 1ES R&D pools on main #57481
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Re-enable BuildWithCommandLine test #57584
    Area-Infrastructure, Test
  • Semi auto implemented properties #57076
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • [WIP] Use cached delegate instances for method group conversions #6642
    Language-C#, Area-Compilers, Blocked, cla-already-signed, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Worker Service: Windows Service arguments are not picked up #38139
  • `msftbot` removes `Needs Author Feedback` when dotnet member comments #38135
  • Startup regression: connectionclose, connectionclosehttps #38134
  • .net 6 rc2 identity login page return 500 #38132
  • Blazor webassembly debugging when hosting in gRPC Application #38131
  • Blazor Server OnInitialized called after setting variable when run under VS2022 but not in VS2019 #38130
  • Some SignInManagerTests are commented out #38129
  • Ability to run multiple Blazor server / Web assembly apps in the same document #38128
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Request: `dotnet watch` with specific build Configuration (and Hot Reload) #38133
  • Blazor server performance improvements #38127
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor server connection reliability improvements #38124
  • Blazor wasm auth diagnostics #38123
  • Better MSAL support for additional scenarios #38122
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Link generation improvements #38121
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Document launchSettings.json #38120
  • Routing performance improvements #38117
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Support rendering components outside of the HttpContext #38114
    .NET 7 Planning
  • First class component support for Multi Page Applications #38112
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor Server auth improvements #38111
    .NET 7 Planning
  • More integration for Blazor Server and SignalR #38109
  • [Question] How does ProducesResponseType inference work for ActionResult<T>? #38108
  • Single file build time regression: plaintext #38107
  • Startup improvement: mvc #38106
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #38105
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #38104
  • VS Code Tooling Issue #38103
  • Update template localization strategy in repo #38102

Closed

  • Blazor Server Localization Middleware works but local time is always UTC. #23662
    Backlog
  • Better Blazor Server integration with the rest of ASP.NET Core #38125
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Server side Blazor + Paste large amount of text into text area with binding = Disconnection of client #5623
    Backlog
  • Setting up Blazor server customers for success #38126
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Customize serialization for IJSRuntime.InvokeAsync #12685
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Adding ResponseCacheAttribute to MVC global filter list does not apply to Razor Pages #18890
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Introduce incrementality into Razor compiler #27267
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Dynamic routing improvements #38119
  • Visual Studio somehow unload project #38118
  • Parsing issue in API version via route #17242
    Backlog
  • SupplyParameterFromQuery doesn't work in non-routable components #36966
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Quarantine Components.E2E tests failing due to Selenium not launching page #34941
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.E2ETest.ServerExecutionTests.ServerJSRootComponentsTest.CannotAddMultipleRootComponentsToTheSameElementAtTheSameTime #35106
    6.0-docs-infra
  • CanRenderComponentDynamically test failure #33733
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Selenium ERR_ADDRESS_IN_USE #33526
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Pass parameters to Blazor virtualization ItemProvider #38085
  • Access Modifiers #36196

  • Single file build time improvement: json, plaintext, plaintext #37923

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Bug] Publishing maui rc2 app to App Store not working -- The app references non-public symbols in MyContactNetwork.MobileMaui: _proc_pidinfo #3290

  • Spike a z-index proof-of-concept #3285

    6.0.200-preview.11

Closed

  • [Bug] Loaded images have no size #1506
  • Is VS Code fully support like Flutter ? #2395
  • App crashes within a few seconds #1383

  • [Bug] Catalyst layout doesn't account for the status bar #755
  • Measurement of Control within a TriggerAction seems not to work #2577
  • Switch to using CollectAppManifestsDependsOn on iOS #2424
    6.0.101-preview.10
  • [Bug] Unable to run maui or maui-blazor template WinUI option from Visual Studio #2100
  • [Bug] [Android] Screen orientation not getting locked #2739
  • [Bug] [Catalyst] Errors loading Custom Fonts. #3032
    6.0.200-preview.11
  • [Bug] Review current Android Shell Layouts #2456
  • [Enhancement] Avoid MAUI Desktop development requiring the enabling of side-loading in Windows #1784
  • [Enhancement] Add ONLY in-code layout creation (or easiest from code) #2433
  • [Bug] Grid Maui Control don't automatically expand the child when wrap inside the NavigationPage #2393
  • [Enhancement] Support unpackaged (non-MSIX) windows apps #1957
  • [Bug] Opening shell flyout menu in WinUI3 crashes the app #1809
  • [Bug] The WinUI program in the MAUI project will report an error on the win 11 system #1973
  • Windows 11 Unhandled exception when we try run MauiWinUI #2020
  • [Bug] Nested childs inside ScrollView not layouting properly #2188
  • [Bug] [Android] Null Reference Exception when using RefreshView if RefreshColor not set. #2439
  • [Bug] LayoutOptions not respected in Hot Reload #2197
    6.0.101-preview.9
  • [Bug] Shell labels don't update with AppThemeBinding changes #2092
  • [Bug] AddHostObjectToScript does not work in MAUI Renderer #2481
  • [Bug] Dynamically changing FlexLayout Direction from code-behind does not re-layout UI #2155
  • [Bug] Opening Shell Flyout with compressed jpg background image raises a Java.Lang.RuntimeException when targeting Android emulator #2105
  • [Bug] The dynamic update of AbsoluteLayout and Grid children's positions is not working. #2044
  • [Bug] Navigating to the second page on App doesn't render any content until you switch tabs #1983
  • [Bug] Android app crashes with glide exception if Image is missing #2756
  • [Enhancement] Break out TestUtils.DeviceTests.Sample into separate respository #2323
  • [Bug] Unable to unit test MAUI Windows Handler to WinUI control #1862
  • [Bug] Image position in grid cannot be customised. #2039
  • [Bug] BackgroundColor is not applied if changed using a binding or in code at runtime #1854

  • [Bug] Fix TabbedPage as root page #2799

  • [Bug] Shell BackgroundColor in UWP, MAC and iOS #3029
    6.0.101-preview.10
  • Make MAUI trimming safe ✂️ #355
  • [Bug] Changes in view position are not dynamically reflected. #1818

Created

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'o') #26559
  • Update internal Cosmos provider code for NRTs #26558
    7.0.0
  • Add embedded READMEs to NuGet packages #26556
  • Allow overriding scaffolded many-to-many mapping in OnModelCreatingPartial #26555
  • Manual DetectChanges() call does not take navigation properties into account #26554
  • Add links to conceptual docs for OptionsBuilder methods #26552
  • EF Core materializes projection property as object with default values instead of null #26551
  • Consider exposing DatabaseFacade.Clean #26550
    Backlog
  • TemporalTables: consider FromSql overloads that can take temporal information (AsOf only) #26548
  • The behavior of Distinct in SqlServer and Cosmos is inconsistent #26547
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Add Select-Methods that are being executed after materialization only #26540
  • End-user way to add custom sql expression #26522
  • Defect: Select after projection behaves unexpectedly in Azure Cosmos DB provider #26517
  • about dotnet ef tool some idea/关于ef 升级数据库时的一些想法 #26536
  • How to create custom EF Core extension? #26500
  • ORA-02292: integrity constraint violated - child record found #26488
  • Recursive CTE call in FromSqlRaw OR FromSqlInterpolated doesn't work in EF Core 5.0 #26462
  • Exception when creating new migration after updating from 6.0-rc.1 to 6.0-rc.2 or 6.0-rtm (daily) #26405
  • Helps on how to create an empty PostgreSQL database quickly #26541
  • AddAsync adds already tracked entities to Added state #26553
  • Generated EF Core migrations should also compile warning-free when part of an assembly having an XML Documentation file #26549

PullRequests

Created

  • Evolve null-checking approach in EFCore #26557

Merged

  • Evolve null-checking approach in Relational #26537
  • Evolve null-checking approach in SQL Server #26534

Updated

  • Fix to #26451 - Temporal Table: Owned Entities support #26526
